- Location: Bathroom, toilet area; floor-mounted fixture next to wall with tile surround.
- Fixture/materials: White vitreous china toilet; wall-mounted metal sheet covering part of the tank; ceramic wall/floor tiles.
- Visible condition: Floor flange/rough-in area exposed (dark circular opening near base); toilet appears removed or not fully installed; rust on metal cover plate.
- Plumbing: Copper supply line with shut-off valve visible on the right; no visible connection to a flush valve (toilet not fully installed).
- Recommendations: Reinstall toilet on proper flange with wax ring and secure mounting; replace metal tank cover with proper lid; inspect subfloor for moisture damage; complete leak test and seal around base.
